title: Cubot Note 21: Review of a budget smartphone - Root-Nation.com - Root-Nation.com
summary: The Cubot Note 21 is an affordable smartphone with a long battery life, a decent main camera, and a high-quality screen with a 90 Hz refresh rate. However, it has a low-quality plastic case, lacks a fingerprint scanner and NFC, and uses an old version of Bluetooth.
likely_naics_codes: ['334220 - Radio and Television Broadcasting and Wireless Communications Equipment Manufacturing', '334419 - Other Electronic Component Manufacturing', '423690 - Other Electronic and Precision Equipment Repair and Maintenance', '443110 - Cellular and Other Wireless Telecommunications']
